amendment.description: To provide a sense of Congress relating to preserving manufactured home communities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1130 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1130 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6314-6315) To provide a sense of Congress relating to preserving manufactured home communities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1130 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1130 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 948.
